behavior wash_the_shirt(shirt:item, sink:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inside(shirt, sink)
        # Place the shirt inside the sink
        
        achieve has_water(sink)
        # Ensure the sink has water
        
        wash(shirt)
        # Wash the shirt explicitly
